stories.text:
Does anyone else use Shift+Click? [0] If so, has it been working for you recently?

For about the pst week, all I get is one of those irritating "Oops, something went wrong!.." error messages, when I try and view an image. The site itself is still up and running. Their Twitter account is full of tumbleweed, so no news there.

[0] https://shft.cl/
stories.title: Ask HN: Shift+Click Broken For Anyone Else?

stories.text:
I don't mean one legacy software, I'm talking a large set of intertwined and complex software systems that were build 30 years ago and still (inefficiently) in use today.

Is rebuilding it into one modern platform a stupid idea? And would a VC fund it?
stories.title: Is rebuilding an entire legacy software system stupid?
